H0.text: How many Bond themes did Shirley Bassey sing. 1

H1.text: How many Bond themes did Shirley Bassey sing. 2

H2.text: How many Bond themes did Shirley Bassey sing. 4

H3.text: How many Bond themes did Shirley Bassey sing. 3

A4.text: Bassey recorded the theme songs for Goldfinger (1964), Diamonds Are Forever (1971), and Moonraker (1979).
